results.title: Introduction to Bioinformatics
results.abstract_summary:
Bioinformatics is a new discipline that addresses the need to manage and
interpret the data that in the past decade was massively generated by genomic
research. This discipline represents the convergence of genomics, biotechnology
and information technology, and encompasses analysis and interpretation of
data, modeling of biological phenomena, and development of algorithms and
statistics.
Bioinformatics is a new discipline that addresses the need to manage and
interpret the data that in the past decade was massively generated by genomic
research. This article presents an introduction to bioinformatics
results.abstractive_summary: bioinformatics is a new discipline that addresses the need to manage and interpret the data that in the past decade was massively generated by genomic research . this discipline represents the convergence of genomics, biotechnology and information technology, and encompasses analysis and interpretation of data .

results.title: Application Of Data Mining In Bioinformatics
results.abstract_summary:
This article highlights some of the basic concepts of bioinformatics and data
mining. It
also highlights some of the current challenges and opportunities of data mining
in bioinformatics.
The
application of data mining in the domain of bioinformatics is explained. It
also highlights some of the current challenges and opportunities of data mining
in bioinformatics.
results.abstractive_summary: this article highlights some of the basic concepts of bioinformatics and data mining . the application of data mining is explained .

results.title: OLAF: An Open Life Science Analysis Framework for Conversational Bioinformatics Powered by Large Language Models
results.abstract_summary:
By combining large language models (LLMs) with a modular agent-pipe-router
architecture, OLAF generates and executes bioinformatics code on real
scientific data, including formats like .h5ad. The system includes an Angular
front end and a Python/Firebase backend, allowing users to run analyses such as
single-cell RNA-seq workflows, gene annotation, and data visualization through
a simple web interface.
The system includes an Angular
front end and a Python/Firebase backend, allowing users to run analyses such as
single-cell RNA-seq workflows, gene annotation, and data visualization through
a simple web interface. It is designed to lower the barrier to computational
biology for non-programmers and support transparent, AI-powered life science
research.
results.abstractive_summary: OLAF generates and executes bioinformatics code on real scientific data . the system includes an Angular front end and a Python/Firebase backend . users can run analyses such as single-cell RNA-seq workflows .
